faqs.question: What is TaxoBuddy?
faqs.answer: TaxoBuddy is an AI-powered legal and tax research engine built on decades of authority, designed to provide professionals with precise, source-verified answers.

faqs.question: Is the intelligence source-verified?
faqs.answer: Yes, every response is grounded in real legal extracts and case law, providing you with the exact sources to verify and cite.

faqs.question: How do I upgrade my plan?
faqs.answer: Currently, we are offering a Free tier. Paid plans are coming soon and will be announcement on our blog and via email.

faqs.question: Can I use TaxoBuddy for free?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Basic tier is free for everyone to start researching and experiencing the power of tax intelligence.
